* AEM version and patch level \(e.g. AEM 6.3 SP1 CFP2\)
* Core Components version \(e.g. 2.0.4\)
* JRE version \(e.g. `Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_152-b16)`\)
